price: Na siku atapo waita na akasema: Mliwajibu nini Mitume?
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
footnotes: Na ewe Mtume! Taja vile vile siku washirikina watapo itwa na Mwenyezi Mungu kwa kutahayarishwa, na wakaambiwa: Mliwajibu nini Mitume wangu nilio watuma kwenu wakuiteni kwenye Imani, nao wakafikisha Ujumbe?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
